title: PC 27 March - Also in Genoa, students' raid in the academic Senate against the agreements with Israel
content:
A part of the demonstrators broke through the door and interrupted the meeting. The rector Federico Delfino is contested

Genova. Against the economic and academic agreements between government, Italian universities,Israeland companies active in the war supply chain, today also in Genoa - such as In many other cities - the protest of the students and of Some professors:14 The Teachers, some precarious workers who have signed the appeal to the RectorFederico Delfinoperinterrupt the collaboration pathsthat they are somehow connected with attacks on the Palestinian population.

Protest started at dawn with apresidioin the atrium of the rectorate, in via Balbi 5, with banners, banquets and an exhibition on the history of the conflict in the Middle East, but then it is overlooked in a realEmpress of an autonomous group of studentsin the room that housed the meeting of theAcademic senate, then interrupted. First, for hours, the same students had protested out of the door screaming slogans like"Outside NATO from the University", playing drums and reading the motivations of the garrison with the megaphone.

boys and girls, on the other hand, havecontestedopenly therectorFederico Delfino both during the Senate and before, during a shortmeeting within his office. On this occasion Delfino was apostrophized with insults of the type "Genocida, murderer" because, not wanting to agree to suspend the Agreements under accusation, has been defined as an accomplice of those who carry out i bombings on Gaza.


On the spot present officials of theDigos. “After a participated garrison, the Rector Delfino abandoned the senate session, reconfirmingNo step backCompared to the death agreements, no dialogue with the students ", they declare to change course.

“In the closure of the comparison - they conclude - he then exploited the mobilization to dopass the narrative of the contrast between "good and democratic" students and "bad and violent" students(carefully avoiding talking about the numerous teachers present) for Divide us: we respect these accusations, the academic community to the sender will not be divided by these exploitation, combined alongside the Palestinian resistance ".
